Cedric,

I don't understand your message. Subclasses of Filter can be defin=
ed
anywhere. Because they are defined as Java code, the filters can be as
c=
omplicated as the users need them to be. Once we (the community) have some
=
experience with how filters are commonly used, I agree that making filters
=
more accessible would be helpful.

Sincerely yours,

Kent Beck
Three Rivers=
